sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , A.GIS_ASSETS_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME ,A.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC || NVL2(GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,GIS_ASSETS_LNM || '-' || GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,GIS_ASSETS_LNM) AS GIS_ASSETS_LNMS ,RTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0),'FM999,999,999.9999'),'.') AS GIS_ASSETS_AR ,RTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0),'FM999,999,999.9999'),'.') AS GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR ,RTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(C.USAGE_AR),0),'FM999,999,999.9999'),'.') AS USAGE_AR ,TO_CHAR(MIN(C.USAGE_PD_FROM),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(MAX(C.USAGE_PD_TO),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO ,TO_CHAR(NVL(A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR-SUM(C.USAGE_AR),0)) AS NO_USAGE_AR ,RTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(ROUND((SUM(C.USAGE_AR)/NULLIF(A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0))*100,2),0),'FM9990D99'),'.' ) AS USAGE_AR_PER
FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.PRMISN_YN ,D.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,D.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,D.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,D.USAGE_AR ,USAGE_PD_FROM ,USAGE_PD_TO
FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F D,ASSETS_RENT_F B WHERE B.PRT_AT_CODE = D.PRT_AT_CODE AND B.MNG_YEAR = D.MNG_YEAR AND B.MNG_NO = D.MNG_NO AND B.MNG_CNT = D.MNG_CNT ) C ON A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND A.GIS_ASSETS_CD = C.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
WHERE A.GIS_ASSETS_AR IS NOT NULL AND A.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN='Y' AND C.PRMISN_YN='Y'
AND A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchPrtAtCode#
AND A.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchFcltyNm# || '%'
AND A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #searchLoc# || '%'
AND C.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#searchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND C.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#searchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
GROUP BY A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , A.GIS_ASSETS_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , A.GIS_ASSETS_AR , A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , C.PRMISN_YN
ORDER BY GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME ,A.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,GIS_ASSETS_LNMS DESC
)S )Z
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,A.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME ,A.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC || NVL2(GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,GIS_ASSETS_LNM || '-' || GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,GIS_ASSETS_LNM) AS GIS_ASSETS_LNMS ,RTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0),'FM999,999,999.9999'),'.') AS GIS_ASSETS_AR ,RTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0),'FM999,999,999.9999'),'.') AS GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR ,RTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(C.USAGE_AR),0),'FM999,999,999.9999'),'.') AS USAGE_AR ,TO_CHAR(MIN(C.USAGE_PD_FROM),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(MAX(C.USAGE_PD_TO),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO ,TO_CHAR(NVL(A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR-SUM(C.USAGE_AR),0)) AS NO_USAGE_AR ,RTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(ROUND((SUM(C.USAGE_AR)/NULLIF(A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0))*100,2),0),'FM9990D99'),'.' ) AS USAGE_AR_PER
FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.PRMISN_YN ,D.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,D.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,D.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,D.USAGE_AR ,USAGE_PD_FROM ,USAGE_PD_TO FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F D,ASSETS_RENT_F B WHERE B.PRT_AT_CODE = D.PRT_AT_CODE AND B.MNG_YEAR = D.MNG_YEAR AND B.MNG_NO = D.MNG_NO AND B.MNG_CNT = D.MNG_CNT ) C ON A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND A.GIS_ASSETS_CD = C.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
WHERE A.GIS_ASSETS_AR IS NOT NULL AND A.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN='Y' AND C.PRMISN_YN='Y'
AND A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchPrtAtCode#
AND A.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchFcltyNm# || '%'
AND A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #searchLoc# || '%'
AND C.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#searchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND C.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#searchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
GROUP BY A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , A.GIS_ASSETS_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , A.GIS_ASSETS_AR , A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , C.PRMISN_YN
)

SELECT A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , A.GIS_ASSETS_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME ,GIS_ASSETS_NM ,A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC || NVL2(GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,GIS_ASSETS_LNM || '-' || GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,GIS_ASSETS_LNM) AS GIS_ASSETS_LNMS ,TO_CHAR(NVL(A.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0)) AS GIS_ASSETS_AR ,TO_CHAR(NVL(A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0)) AS GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR ,TO_CHAR(NVL(C.USAGE_AR,0)) AS USAGE_AR ,TO_CHAR(C.USAGE_PD_FROM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(C.USAGE_PD_TO,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO ,TO_CHAR(NVL(A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR-C.USAGE_AR,0)) AS NO_USAGE_AR ,RTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(ROUND((C.USAGE_AR/NULLIF(A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0))*100,2),0),'FM9990D99'),'.' ) AS USAGE_AR_PER ,C.ENTRPSCD ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(C.ENTRPSCD, '1') ENTRPS_NM
,C.USAGE_PURPS ,C.USAGE_DTLS ,C.ENTRPS_SE ,C.EXEMPT_SE ,C.EXEMPT_RSN ,C.EXEMPT_PD_FROM ,C.EXEMPT_PD_TO ,C.COMPUT_DTLS ,C.OLNLP ,C.APPLC_PRICE ,C.APPLC_TARIFF ,C.APPLC_MTH ,C.RDCXPT_FEE ,C.FEE ,C.TRMNAT_DT ,C.TRMNAT_RSN , C.MNG_YEAR , C.MNG_NO , C.MNG_CNT , C.PRT_AT_CODE
FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.PRMISN_YN ,D.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,D.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,D.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,D.USAGE_AR ,USAGE_PD_FROM ,USAGE_PD_TO ,B.ENTRPSCD ,B.REG_USR ,B.REGIST_DT ,B.UPD_USR ,B.UPDT_DT ,B.QUAY_GROUP_CD
, B.MNG_YEAR , B.MNG_NO , B.MNG_CNT , B.PRT_AT_CODE ,D.USAGE_PURPS ,D.USAGE_DTLS ,D.ENTRPS_SE ,D.EXEMPT_SE ,D.EXEMPT_RSN ,D.EXEMPT_PD_FROM ,D.EXEMPT_PD_TO ,D.COMPUT_DTLS ,D.OLNLP ,D.APPLC_PRICE ,D.APPLC_TARIFF ,D.APPLC_MTH ,D.RDCXPT_FEE ,D.FEE ,D.TRMNAT_DT ,D.TRMNAT_RSN
FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F D,ASSETS_RENT_F B WHERE B.PRT_AT_CODE = D.PRT_AT_CODE AND B.MNG_YEAR = D.MNG_YEAR AND B.MNG_NO = D.MNG_NO AND B.MNG_CNT = D.MNG_CNT ) C ON A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND A.GIS_ASSETS_CD = C.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
WHERE A.GIS_ASSETS_AR IS NOT NULL AND A.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN='Y' AND C.PRMISN_YN='Y'
AND A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND A.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd#
AND A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd#
AND C.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#searchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND C.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#searchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
GROUP BY A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , A.GIS_ASSETS_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , A.GIS_ASSETS_AR , A.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , C.PRMISN_YN ,C.USAGE_AR ,C.USAGE_PD_FROM ,C.USAGE_PD_TO ,C.ENTRPSCD ,C.REG_USR ,C.REGIST_DT ,C.UPD_USR ,C.UPDT_DT
,C.USAGE_PURPS ,C.USAGE_DTLS ,C.ENTRPS_SE ,C.EXEMPT_SE ,C.EXEMPT_RSN ,C.EXEMPT_PD_FROM ,C.EXEMPT_PD_TO ,C.COMPUT_DTLS ,C.OLNLP ,C.APPLC_PRICE ,C.APPLC_TARIFF ,C.APPLC_MTH ,C.RDCXPT_FEE ,C.FEE ,C.TRMNAT_DT ,C.TRMNAT_RSN , C.MNG_YEAR , C.MNG_NO , C.MNG_CNT , C.PRT_AT_CODE ,C.QUAY_GROUP_CD , C.MNG_YEAR , C.MNG_NO , C.MNG_CNT , C.PRT_AT_CODE ORDER BY GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME ,A.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,GIS_ASSETS_LNMS DESC ;
